kpi.name: M5006C8

kpi_info.title: MINIMUM NUMBER OF USED R99 CE FOR UL
kpi_info.use: "The minimum number of used R99 Channel Elements in Uplink direction. The counter includes R99 CEs and hybrid CFs used by R99 users + CSoHSPA users that are allocated to R99 CE licensed area + R99 CEs consumed for CCHs.Note: CCHs consume R99 CEs only in case of Rel. 2 HW. In Rel. 3 and mixed Flexi BTSs (Rel. 3 + Rel. 2) CCCH processing sets are consumed instead. Only additional CCHs are calculated; that is, CCH capacity included in HW price is not visible in counters.Updated: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is calculated every 5 seconds. Samples are based on the minimum used channel elements in the UL direction."

kpi.kpi_alias: MINIMUM NUMBER OF USED R99 CE FOR UL
